thread.title: Charlize Theron Once Invited President Obama To A Strip Club, AS ONE DOES
thread.title_full: Charlize Theron Once Invited President Obama To A Strip Club, AS ONE DOES

author: Andy McDonald
title: Charlize Theron Once Invited President Obama To A Strip Club, AS ONE DOES
text:
Charlize Theron Once Invited President Obama To A Strip Club, AS ONE DOES Andy McDonald Associate Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 07/21/2015 | Edited: 29 minutes ago 
Oh God, this old story again? 
You know when you meet the president and you're a little nervous and then you invite him to a strip club? 
On "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" Monday night , actress Charlize Theron told Kimmel about the time she met President Obama -- and how she says ridiculous things when she's nervous. 
Yeah, we'd say this qualifies.
